Component.description: Category of metadata (e.g. Tools, Publications, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows.
Component.title: Component

GrantViewKey.description: Unique GrantView_id foreign key(s) that group the resource with other components, as part of the same grant-associated collection. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
GrantViewKey.title: GrantView Key

PersonViewKey.description: Unique PersonView_id foreign key(s) that group the resource with other components, as part of the same person-associated studies. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
PersonViewKey.title: PersonView Key

ProjectViewKey.description: Unique ProjectView_id foreign key(s) that group the resource with other components, as part of the same grant-associated studies. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
ProjectViewKey.title: ProjectView Key

StudyDataPermission.description: The list of entities or objects that define or enforce data sharing permissions. Maps to DUOplus4.
StudyDataPermission.title: Study Data Permission

StudyDataTier.description: The access tier(s) associated with the data in this study. Maps to DUOplus5.
StudyDataTier.title: Study Data Tier

StudyDataUseCodes.description: DUO code - A data item that is used to indicate consent permissions for datasets and/or materials and relates to the purposes for which datasets and/or material might be removed, stored, or used. Available DUO code definitions can be found at mc2-center.github.io/data-models/valid_values/sharingPlans/#attribute-dsp-data-use-codes
StudyDataUseCodes.title: Study Data Use Codes

StudyDe-identificationMethodDescription.description: Description of the process of removing potentially identifying data or data elements to render data into a form that does not identify individuals and where identification is not likely to take place.
StudyDe-identificationMethodDescription.title: Study De-identification Method Description

StudyDe-identificationMethodSoftware.description: Software that was used to de-identify the data (if used)
StudyDe-identificationMethodSoftware.title: Study De-identification Method Software

StudyDe-identificationMethodType.description: General description of the de-identification method. Maps to DUOplus3.
StudyDe-identificationMethodType.title: Study De-identification Method Type

StudyDescription.description: Description of the study, including the types of experimental assays, model systems, types of analysis, description of cohort, associated vulnerable populations, special categories of data, rare diseases, etc. Maps to DUOplus2.
StudyDescription.title: Study Description

StudyId.description: A unique primary key that enables record updates using schematic.
StudyId.title: Study_id

StudyIndexDate.description: The reference event associated with timepoints in this study. One of Diagnosis Date, Enrollment Date, Collection Date, or Birth Date.
StudyIndexDate.title: Study Index Date

StudyInvestigator.description: Investigator(s) associated with the project. Multiple names should be provided as a comma-separated list.
StudyInvestigator.title: Study Investigator

StudyLicense.description: Official or legal permission to do or own a specified thing. Studies with data that will be submitted to CDS are required to provide a license. Maps to DUOplus6.
StudyLicense.title: Study License

StudyNumberofParticipants.description: The number of participant instances associated with systematic investigation into a subject.
StudyNumberofParticipants.title: Study Number of Participants

StudyNumberofSamples.description: The number of specimens associated with systematic investigation into a subject.
StudyNumberofSamples.title: Study Number of Samples

StudyReuseStatement.description: The funder-, contributor-, patient-, etc., derived content that includes terms, conditions, or statements associated with accessing and reusing the resource(s). Maps to DUOplus7.
StudyReuseStatement.title: Study Reuse Statement

StudySourceGeography.description: The list of country(ies) where the data associated with this study was generated. Maps to DUOplus1.
StudySourceGeography.title: Study Source Geography

StudydbGaPAccessionId.description: A stable unique alphanumeric identifier assigned to a study and any objects by the database of Genotypes and Phenotypes (dbGaP). Required for controlled access data being submitted to CDS/CRDC.
StudydbGaPAccessionId.title: Study dbGaP Accession Id
